title: Please ID this Magazine Font - The title "Adult"
content:
Can you help id the font in the title "ADULT" in the below link? Thank you!  
 [http://adult-mag.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003258/http:/adult-mag.com/ "http://adult-mag.com")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Screen Shot 2014-02-05 at 7.29.14 PM.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003258/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202014-02-05%20at%207.29.14%20PM.png) | 62.86 KB |
author: typfile1

comments.content:
I can't find it, but I don't think it's an actual font.  
It feels like somebody added serifs to a sans font like **[Peignot Demi Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003258/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=&fid=8e48c4feac89f8aba0fa4150b22e108d&fsize=48&text=ADULT&fit=1)**
[Already tried](http://web.archive.org/web/20140405003258/http:/typophile.com/node/107881) to identify it but with no success. Most probably a bespoke typeface exclusive for Adult Mag...

Of course there is the third option, a clip job on a serifed font. Didn't have time to track it down, but I was looking for matching heavy fonts with the spurred top on the A and an open top 4.  
don
thank you Don, Ryuk and fvilanakis!
